programme.title: The Art Scene
programme.desc: In this episode of The Art Scene, the focus is that on the art of dance. Dance as an art form has a colourful history in Singapore. The three races has nurtured their dance forms through generations. Apart from the traditional dance forms, the modern dance forms are also taking a centre stage with the new age millennials of Singapore.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S3
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating it has claimed the lives of millions. Using incredible archive and footages, We'll relive these weather spectacles, revealing very personal stories of people who have captured the entire event.

programme.title: Just for Laughs Gags S20
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: CAMOKAKIS: Whole Lot Fall In!
programme.desc: Hosts Paul Foster and Laanya Erza invite Haresh Tilani, Juni Goh, Constance Lau and Sofia Dendroff to embark on an exciting journey of search and rescue operations in the RSAF.

programme.title: Animals Unleashed
programme.desc: Animals Unleashed is a user-generated content show that features the most unpredictable and hilarious animal clips from around the world. From the wild to the living room, each episode showcases animals at their most surprising, mischievous and outrageous! Each action-packed episode features the very best animal clips available packaged into related segments, features, or even games, all with highly-entertaining narration.

programme.title: The Kelly Clarkson Show S3
programme.desc: Winner of Daytime Emmy Awards 2020 and 2021 for Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show Host and Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show. Won Outstanding Lighting Direction and Outstanding Art Direction/Set Decoration/Scenic Design for Daytime Emmy Awards 2020.

programme.title: Mirette Investigates
programme.desc: Follow Mirette and Jean-Pat on their thrilling adventures around the world, and enjoy laughter and moments of friendship!

programme.title: Nefertine On The Nile
programme.desc: Nefertine is an eight-year-old girl who lives in ancient Egypt and is gifted with inexhaustible curiosity and courage. She occasionally gets herself into sticky situations, but luckily her trusted friend Piramses is always there to give her a hand. The two friends, accompanied by the cat Micerina, go on incredible adventures, from investigating mysterious mummies to discovering the secrets of the sphinx!

programme.title: Ready Jet Go! S2
programme.desc: While making a cake and using a pictorial recipe, Carrot and Mindy are short one ingredient, so they head to the store in the Family Wagon. Carrot accidentally pushes a wrong button on the control panel and - whoa! - the wagon takes off into outer space! Using methodical experimentation, a diagram, and record keeping, Mindy and Carrot (unfamiliar with the souped-up controls) figure out how to properly fly the saucer. Back home, they finally finish baking the cake!

programme.title: Butterbean's Cafe S2
programme.desc: Animated series about a fairy and her adventures running a neighborhood cafe with her friends.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: Rover's wants to spend more time with Ollie. But Ollie is too busy to give him the attention he craves. When Sloppy's time machine goes crazy and causes them to body swap, Ollie and Rover learn to walk a mile in each other's shoes. The gang are celebrating the Ollicopter's birthday. Things go wrong when the Imp tampers with the Ollicopter's heart, turning it from a loyal friend to a cold hearted machine.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2
programme.desc: Travelling the world with their teacher, mentor and friend Ubercorn, a disco-grooving unicorn, the Go Jetters are fixing the mishaps caused by the mischievous meddlings of Grandmaster Glitch in new locations including Central Park in New York, Machu Picchu, China, Japan, Mali, and Petra in Jordan. And now we get to know our plucky international heroes, Xuli, Kyan, Lars and Foz even better, as Series 2 takes us to the top-secret island home of the Go Jet Academy to see them intraining.

programme.title: My Little Chef
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Aayaana is the youngest daughter of Vasantham's power couple Jaenani Netra and Elamaran Natarajan. Laser-focused Aayaana wants to make a dish that she usually makes with her sister, but this time, she only has Enlai as her assistant. In the midst of cooking, catastrophe strikes when Aayaana forgets an important step to cook a key component. Will she be able to save the dish?

programme.title: Jamie Cooks Italy
programme.desc: In this glorious celebration of all things Italian, Jamie travels through Italy sampling mouth-watering delicacies made by the mammas and the nonnas who've been passing on perfect family recipes for generations. We discover the secrets and the simplicity of Italy's best home cooking, and how to prepare classic Italian kitchen dishes at home. Combining the stunning scenery of Italy with Jamie's boundless enthusiasm for Italian cuisine, we follow him and best friend and mentor Gennaro Contaldo.

programme.desc: The elite tactical NAGA team sends drones into the tunnel to check on the train's situation, but the signals are jammed by the hostage-takers. The police scrambles to find Wen Si but she has to earn the trust of Joseph before she can take over the negotiations. The situation turns when Black realises he has been played out by the police.

And while Shaun seems to be thriving in Guatemala, Lea is still struggling with the loss of her baby.
